channel.title: Yon Zilch's blog
channel.description: Recent content on Yon Zilch's blog

item.title: My App Defaults 2023
item.description: Intro To contribute this Repo And inspired by these blogs: https://yinji.org/5179.html https://anotherdayu.com/2023/5452/ https://blog.douchi.space/app-defaults/ My App Defaults 2023 📨 Mail Client：BetterBird, RoundCube(Web Client) 📮 Mail Server: MxRoute with my own domains, Disroot, Protonmail 📝 Notes: Joplin, Logseq, AnyType ✅ To-Do: Tasks. Logseq 📷 Photo Shooting: Android Default Camera 🟦 Photo Management: Aves Libre, digiKam 📆 Calendar: Etar, Countdate 📁 Cloud File Storage: Alist(self-hosted) as frontend, Storj DCS, 4everland IPFS etc. as backend

item.title: My First Post
item.description: Hello World! This is my first post in Hugo. I am excited to start building my new website with this powerful static site generator. Hugo makes it easy to quickly create content and customize my site exactly how I want it. The default templates and themes provide a great starting point, so I don’t have to start completely from scratch. I can’t wait to add more posts and share my knowledge with the world!

item.title: Hello World!
item.description: Welcome to WordPress. This is your first post. Edit or delete it, then start writing!
